name: lpcregister
description: Registers a volume to its FreeSurfer anatomical using Local Pearson Correlation (LPC) (the AFNI lpc_align.py program). Creates a FreeSurfer register.dat file.

inputs.description: Subject ID found in SUBJECTS_DIR. The reference volume is the mri/brain volume (modifiable with --fsvol). Converted to analyze using mri_convert.
inputs.name: Subject ID

inputs.description: Volume identifier of the movable volume. Must be specified suitably for mri_convert. Uses first frame unless --frame is specified.
inputs.name: Movable Volume

inputs.description: Output registration file mapping RAS in the reference to RAS in the movable. The file/matrix format is understood by freesurfer.
inputs.name: Registration File

inputs.description: Use 9 degrees of freedom; default is 6.
inputs.name: 9 DOF Flag

inputs.description: Use 12 degrees of freedom; default is 6.
inputs.name: 12 DOF Flag

inputs.description: Specify the frame number other than the first. For SPM analyze, specify the file corresponding to the desired frame as each file only has one frame.
inputs.name: Frame Number

inputs.description: Register to the middle frame of the mov volume as the template. Cannot be used with --frame.
inputs.name: Mid Frame Flag

inputs.description: Use FreeSurfer volume id; default is brainmask.
inputs.name: FreeSurfer Volume

inputs.description: Output volume file for resampled mov.
inputs.name: Output Volume

output-files.description: Output registration file in FreeSurfer format.
output-files.name: Output Registration File

output-files.description: The resampled movable volume if --o is specified.
output-files.name: Resampled Volume

author: FreeSurfer Developers
